1.0.0-alpha1.name: drupal/permissions_by_term

security-coverage.message: Alpha releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

1.0.0-alpha1.description: Allows limiting the selection of specific taxonomy terms by user or role and prevents users to display views-pages, which lists entries for taxonomy terms, for which they don't have access.

dev-1.x.name: drupal/permissions_by_term

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: Restricts access to nodes by taxonomy terms in relation to users and their roles.

1.15.0.name: drupal/permissions_by_term

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.15.0.description: Limits the selection of specific taxonomy terms by users or roles. Prevents users to display nodes and nodes on views pages, for which which they do not have access by taxonomy term restriction.
